project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Create a simple text-based game where players can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and face challenges.

task.name: Set up the basic game structure with room navigation
Implement challenges that players encounter in rooms
Write tests for the implemented features (room navigation, item picking, inventory, challenges)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
